alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:54PM CDT until June 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jerusalem, or 16 miles north of Morrilton, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lanty... Jerusalem... Happy Bend... Cleveland... St. Vincent... Blick... Hattieville... Appleton... Blackwell... Wonderview... Economy... Macedonia in Conway County... Caglesville... Oak Grove in Pope County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
